keywords: Klay Thompson,Golden State Warriors,warriors vs cavaliers,draymond green,Warriors,stephen curry
description: Golden State Warriors beat Cleveland Cavaliers 96-82 in the NBA. Klay Thompson scored 17 points in his return from back-to-back injuries. The 31-year-old missed 941 days after tearing the ACL in his left knee in the 2019 NBA finals. The five-time All-Star also celebrated career milestones of 12,000 points and 1,800 three-pointers.
topicText:

Golden State's Klay Thompson scores 17 points on his return from two devastating injuries to reach career milestones and help the Warriors beat Cleveland ...

He's back! Klay Thompson returns to Warriors after 941-day injury ...
Klay Thompson scored 17 in his return from two devastating injuries that sidelined him more than two years, helping the Warriors past the Cavaliers.
Klay Thompson shows no signs of rust in first game back for Warriors
After 941 long days since he last played in a meaningful NBA game, Klay Thompson made his return to the Golden State Warriors lineup in the team's 96-82 win ...
Klay Thompson scores 17 in return, helps Warriors top Cavs

Here's What Steph Curry Said After Klay Thompson Played His First ...
Steph Curry spoke to reporters after the Golden State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday night. Klay Thompson played his first game in over ...
Klay Thompson receives Warriors game ball from Steph Curry's son ...
